description: The alleged incident happened on 11 February in Westfield Road.
title: Man charged after Wolverhampton teens threatened with knife
title_page: Man charged after Wolverhampton teens threatened with knife - BBC News
maintext:
A man has been charged with weapon offences following a group of teenagers being threatened with a knife.
Brandon Addison was arrested on Tuesday after the alleged incident, which took place in Westfield Road, Wolverhampton, on 11 February - a machete and a large knife were recovered.
The 21-year-old, of no fixed address, was charged with possession of an offensive weapon and threatening a person with a blade in a public place.
He is expected to appear at Wolverhampton Magistrates Court on Wednesday.
